text: "Drugs or Jesus" is a 2005 song by country singer Tim McGraw and is the third single from his eighth studio album Live Like You Were Dying. It went to number 87 in the United States and also went to number 14 on the Billboard Hot Country Songs chart and number 6 on the Canadian Country charts. ==References== Category:2005 songs Category:2000s ballads Category:Country ballads Category:Tim McGraw songs
title: Drugs or Jesus
